Project description

Minimize 1/2 x^T G x - a^T x

Subject to C.T x >= b

This routine uses the the Goldfarb/Idnani dual algorithm [1].

References

  1. D. Goldfarb and A. Idnani (1983). A numerically stable dualmethod for solving strictly convex quadratic programs.Mathematical Programming, 27, 1-33.
